tree.description: North American Unclassified Languages: Golla, Goddard, Campbell, Mithun, Mixco 2007

root.tree-val: North American Unclassified Languages: Golla, Goddard, Campbell, Mithun, Mixco 2007
root.pub-comments: The authors claim that there are no, or essentially on, linguistic data on which to base a classification for these languages (pg. 36).
root.publications: Campbell, Lyle , Ives Goddard, Victor Golla, J. Lachlan Mackenzie, Marianne Mithun & Mauricio J. Mixco. 2007. Atlas of the World's Languages, 2 edn., 32-43. London, New York: Routledge.

child.tree-val: North American Unclassified Languages: Golla, Goddard, Campbell, Mithun, Mixco 2007
child.pub-comments: The authors claim that there are no, or essentially on, linguistic data on which to base a classification for this language, yet ethnographic and historical evidence seem to indicate that this langauge might be linked to the Uto-Aztecan family (pg. 37).
child.publications: Campbell, Lyle , Ives Goddard, Victor Golla, J. Lachlan Mackenzie, Marianne Mithun & Mauricio J. Mixco. 2007. Atlas of the World's Languages, 2 edn., 32-43. London, New York: Routledge.
